医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
世卫组织青年理事会发布健康社会宣言世卫组织青年理事会发布了第一份《创建健康社会青年宣言》，其中提出了一系列由世界各地青年提供信息和制定的行动呼吁，旨在赋予青年权力，让他们在为所有人创建更健康、更安全的社会中发挥核心作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/WHO-Youth-Council-launches-declaration-for-healthier-societies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/WHO-Youth-Council-launches-declaration-for-healthier-societies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e242ec46-60c6-4439-9092-5e7bc6f3b2ef Mon, 14 Oct 2024 22:49:49 -0400 WHO Youth Council launches declaration for healthier societies
世卫组织获得近 10 亿新的和重申的资金承诺世界卫生组织（WHO）今天收到欧洲国家、基金会和其他机构提供的近 7 亿美元的新资金承诺，以及另外 3 亿美元的重申承诺，有力地体现了高层支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/WHO-secures-nearly-1-billion-in-new-and-reaffirmed-funding-commitments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/WHO-secures-nearly-1-billion-in-new-and-reaffirmed-funding-commitments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de732091-2f78-4d2a-bd30-4d431b853c7e Mon, 14 Oct 2024 22:46:42 -0400 WHO secures nearly 1 billion in new and reaffirmed funding commitments
发现与大脑发育和疾病相关的人类特异性基因人类大脑的显着长期发育在哺乳动物中是独一无二的，被认为有助于我们提高学习能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Uncovering- human-specific-genes-linked-to-brain-development-and-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Uncovering- human-specific-genes-linked-to-brain-development-and-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5a95efc-3e3c-4895-a0cc-244f85392145 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 22:40:19 -0400 Uncovering human-specific genes linked to brain development and disorders
探索 CPB2 基因在产气荚膜梭菌感染中的作用产气荚膜梭菌是一种广泛存在于动物和人类肠道中的细菌，以引起严重的肠道疾病而闻名。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Exploring-the-role-of-CPB2-gene-in-C-perfringens-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Exploring-the-role-of-CPB2-gene-in-C-perfringens-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8134599c-719e-4118-8192-819059f5f86b Mon, 14 Oct 2024 22:32:31 -0400 Exploring the role of CPB2 gene in C. perfringens infections
索马鲁肽可增强小鼠和人脑模型的认知能力并减少阿尔茨海默病的病理学研究人员发现，索马鲁肽可以改善阿尔茨海默病模型中的认知功能，减少淀粉样蛋白和 tau 蛋白病理，同时恢复小鼠和人脑类器官中催产素的水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Semaglutide-enhances-cognitive-bility-and-reduces-Alzheimere28099s-pathology-in-mice-and- human-brain-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Semaglutide-enhances-cognitive-bility-and-reduces-Alzheimere28099s-pathology-in-mice-and- human-brain-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=198e2dfe-88d4-4527-b6db-b89b6ba42488 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 22:01:00 -0400 Semaglutide enhances cognitive abilities and reduces Alzheimer’s pathology in mice and human brain models
索马鲁肽可改善肥胖患者的心脏健康并减轻体重，但有副作用索马鲁肽可显着减少超重和肥胖患者的心血管事件和不良反应。该研究强调了索马鲁肽在心血管健康方面优于其他 GLP-1 激动剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Semaglutide-improves-heart-health-and-reduces-weight-in-obese-病人-but-with-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Semaglutide-improves-heart-health-and-reduces-weight-in-obese-病人-but-with-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa4a0bd1-00d1-4915-bbce-b21fe0bdc5c9 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 21:29:00 -0400 Semaglutide improves heart health and reduces weight in obese patients, but with side effects
霹雳舞者多年头部旋转受伤后，头皮肿块被移除由于重复的头旋，霹雳舞者可能会在头皮上形成纤维团，称为头旋孔。最近的 BMJ 病例报告详细介绍了手术有效切除肿块、缓解症状的病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Breakdancere28099s-scalp-mass-removed-after-years-of-headspin-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Breakdancere28099s-scalp-mass-removed-after-years-of-headspin-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c44816a7-f38b-4637-9a3e-b8497d813c0f Mon, 14 Oct 2024 21:06:00 -0400 Breakdancer’s scalp mass removed after years of headspin injuries
差异基因表达与酒精使用障碍相关，提供新的治疗可能性研究人员发现了与成瘾相关的大脑区域的关键基因表达差异，这为酒精使用障碍和潜在的治疗靶点提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Differential-gene-express-linked-to-alcohol-use-disorder-offering-new-treatment-possibilities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/Differential-gene-express-linked-to-alcohol-use-disorder-offering-new-treatment-possibilities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1ffdea3-8b6a-473e-ad10-b136dfa7d90e Mon, 14 Oct 2024 17:33:00 -0400 Differential gene expression linked to alcohol use disorder, offering new treatment possibilities
新的小瓶尺寸可以为医疗保险节省数百万美元的阿尔茨海默病药物费用新的研究表明，通过简单地引入新的小瓶尺寸，减少被丢弃的未使用药物的数量，医疗保险可以节省高达 74% 的因废弃阿尔茨海默氏症药物 Lecanemab 造成的损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/New-vial-size-could-save-Medicare-millions-on-Alzheimers-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/New-vial-size-could-save-Medicare-millions-on-Alzheimers-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15eafad9-3a59-4e3f-93f3-eaefa79f1a33 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 14:00:28 -0400 New vial size could save Medicare millions on Alzheimer's drug
密歇根大学获得 3000 万美元拨款用于增强遗传数据存储密歇根大学将大幅增加其大型 TOPMed 数据中心中存储的遗传信息的数量和类型，供世界各地寻求基因组治疗疾病的研究人员和医疗保健提供者使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/University-of-Michigan-receives-2430-million-grant-to-enhance-genic-data-storage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241014/University-of-Michigan-receives-2430-million-grant-to-enhance-genic-data-storage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d96dcc7-c5fb-4c67-8193-b9881059fb40 Mon, 14 Oct 2024 13:35:49 -0400 University of Michigan receives $30 million grant to enhance genetic data storage
